definition: table/desk/classifier for tables of guests at a banquet etc
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
erhua variant of 桌面[zhuo1 mian4]
on the table/fig. everything open and above board

sentences.english: But the amounts they have put on the table have been small.
sentences.chinese: 但是在桌面上提出來的價格是這麼少。

sentences.english: Tabletop displays commercially available are the size of a coffee table.
sentences.chinese: 商用版的桌面顯示器有一張咖啡桌那麼大。

sentences.english: It flamed out and fell heavily on the table.
sentences.chinese: 那機器人最終噴出火花重重地摔在桌面上。

sentences.english: Watch this ticker on your desktop or put it on your website or MySpace .
sentences.chinese: 最新的功能是可把幻燈秀崁在自己的電腦桌面。

sentences.english: Always put your teacup on a saucer, never on the tabletop.
sentences.chinese: 把茶杯托盤上，不要將茶碗直接桌面上。

sentences.english: After finishing fax, please take back documents promptly and keep the desk clean.
sentences.chinese: 大家發完傳真後，請及時收回文件，並保持桌面整潔。

sentences.english: I also use a resistive putty for tabletop exercises to do the same things with my patients.
sentences.chinese: 我也用電阻膩子桌面演習做同樣的事，與我的病人。

sentences.english: The fish is so fresh, it is like a fish jumped on the table and cooked itself.
sentences.chinese: 活像是魚自己跳上桌面瞬間煮熟般鮮美。

sentences.english: The desktop version comes pre-installed with a GUI while the server version does not
sentences.chinese: 桌面版預裝了GUI，而服務器版沒有。

sentences.english: Eventually, IBM proceeded to throw the towel in the desktop-OS wars.
sentences.chinese: 最終，IBM在桌面OS的戰爭中舉起了白旗。

sentences.english: Imagine an idea as a tabletop.
sentences.chinese: 把一個念頭想象成一張桌面。

sentences.english: From the table-top, the lace coverings.
sentences.chinese: 桌面上，沒有了花邊檯布。

sentences.english: The table is inlaid with an ivory flower-pattern.
sentences.chinese: 桌面上嵌着象牙雕成的花。

sentences.english: This HTML page is built into the add-on and is included in both the desktop and the mobile version.
sentences.chinese: 桌面版和移動版的擴展都有這個頁面。

sentences.english: Click on Desktop Background located at the bottom of the window.
sentences.chinese: 點擊窗口下面的桌面背景。

definition: small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
